timeline.message:
Major refactoring of HeaderBalanceFragment removed unused code, replaced Loaders with LiveDatas.
Fixed the issue with not displaying user profile picture.
Unified the way of displaying the profile picture across the app
Handling external URLs as profile pictures
Fixed a bug causing the external URL not to be saved
Fixed the bug causing the notifications count text view being displayed during blockchain sync
Merge branch 'get-profile-picture' into profile-picture-from-url
Fixed the bug causing the notifications count text view being displayed during blockchain sync
Merge remote-tracking branch 'origin/get-profile-picture' into get-profile-picture
Merge branch 'get-profile-picture' into profile-picture-from-url
Minor UX improvement
Added missing code removed during tests
Simplified the use of Google Drive URLs

Fixed the IOException(Cleartext HTTP traffic to drive.google.com not permitted) on Android 10
Added logs
Zoom the profile picture when editing

Merge branch 'get-profile-picture' into profile-picture-extarnal-drive

# Conflicts:
#	wallet/src/de/schildbach/wallet/ui/EditProfileActivity.kt
Fixed the bug reported during code review
Minor code refactoring

Optimised memory management in ExternalUrlProfilePictureDialog
Added an option to discontinue use of the profile picture URL at any time
Unified the way od displaying profile picture
Fixed the issue with removing profile picture URL
Avoid resetting profile picture when changing display name
Refactored profile picture URLs support for Google Drive added Dropbox support
Add Google Drive Support (Proof of concept)
Add image upload source chooser dialog
Add choose source dialog resources
Update Worker to support image upload
Update Google Drive Support
Change update profile UI, add error handling
Revert ic_error.xml and change its size in fragment_update_profile_error.xml

Fix profile visibility on More screen when no user is registered

Other minor formatting fixes.
Public URL Improvements
minor fixes to Public URL dialog

timeline.message:
Merge branch 'evonet-develop' of http://github.com/dashevo/dash-wallet into dashpay-google-drive

# Conflicts:
#	wallet/src/de/schildbach/wallet/ui/EditProfileActivity.kt
#	wallet/src/de/schildbach/wallet/ui/dashpay/EditProfileViewModel.kt
#	wallet/src/de/schildbach/wallet/ui/dashpay/ExternalUrlProfilePictureDialog.kt
#	wallet/src/de/schildbach/wallet/ui/dashpay/utils/ProfilePictureDisplay.kt

Merge branch 'dashpay-public-url-improvements' of http://github.com/dashevo/dash-wallet into dashpay-google-drive

# Conflicts:
#	wallet/res/values/strings-extra.xml
#	wallet/src/de/schildbach/wallet/ui/dashpay/EditProfileViewModel.kt
#	wallet/src/de/schildbach/wallet/ui/dashpay/work/UpdateProfileWorker.kt
ChooseStorageServiceDialog.kt: Remove unused imports, variables
ChooseStorageServiceDialog: Remove unused import
Add upload dialog
PictureUploadProgressDialog: Add copyright
PictureUploadProgressDialog: Remove unused imports
Update code, add copyright
build.gradle: remove unused dependencies
Update disclaimer for ChooseStorageServiceDialog
Use GoogleDriveService
Add more error handling for Google Drive Authentication
UpdateProfileWorker: add rest of Google Drive support
Add some more error handling, logging
proguard.cfg: Add Google Drive exceptions
Add logging, device id, etc
Remove Tasks from gradle-build and useless code
Merge branch 'evonet-develop' of https://github.com/dashevo/dash-wallet into dashpay-google-drive
Fix 2 other merging issues
merge with previous stories
profilePictureChanged should be true if uploaded
Keep ImgurImg so release builds can upload
CropImageActivity: Return RESULT_CANCELED

EditProfileActivity: various fixes

1. when uploading beings, prevent screen from updating the profile from platform
2. when uploading is finished, set the profilePictureChanged = true
3. when saving, use profilePictureUploadLiveData (if an image was uploaded)
EditProfileViewModel: Add logging to Imgur Upload process
ExternalUrlProfilePictureDialog: modify error handling to match designs
ExternalUrlProfilePictureDialog: Always load the url fresh
GravatarProfilePictureDialog: obtain the G rated profile image
Merge branch 'dashpay-fix-improvements' of https://github.com/dashevo/dash-wallet into dashpay-google-drive
Remove obsolete dialog
Remove commented code
Reuse ImgurPolicyDialog for all Services.
Improve Google Drive Functionality
Modify URL regex
Remove file and ftp protocols from valid URL's
Merge branch 'dashpay-fix-improvements' of https://github.com/dashevo/dash-wallet into dashpay-google-drive
Remove comments
Fix crashes with upload state dialog
